channel.title: [Delta] Edge4Pk | Pk shop | Working specials | Activity shop | Pk only
channel.description:
[center][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,516722.0.html]EDGE4PK V2 IS OUT NOW![/url] [b]____________________________________________________________________________ Welcome everyone, I decided to release my server here, Which was original [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,446621.msg3277805.html#msg3277805]Demise pking 5[/url]
Lets get started! ______________________________________________________________________________ [/b]
[b]Download links[/b]
[url=http://up.ht/qfskEw][IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/jshchz.jpg[/img] Download client[/url] [url=http://up.ht/nO0pxf][IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/jshchz.jpg[/img] Download server[/url]
[b]What does this server has to offer?[/b] [u]Stable[/u] [u]30 Mb client[/u] (Removed tons of Mb out the client folder) Added the correct [u]hotkeys[/u] [b]F10[/b] and [b]F11[/b] are used to switch between new and old hits [u]Slayer is a pking skill (For every kill you earn XP)[/u] Ingame Pk highscore's 90% of the items witch are used does have the correct special (Including statius, vesta etc.) Activity shop Donator shop Pk shop Normal shops Customs like statius & zuriel's Staff online list Custom setting tab with teleports and other cool stuff | Custom interfaces | New interfaces Pking quest tab Small mini quest Custom minigames Donator zone Working friend chat Some small fixes Overload & Extreme pots Admin & Donator items (Unlimited overload, Hp potion, Perfect ring & more) Commands such as ::cash and ::master Removed grim reaper (Cause lag :S) Windows 7 run More that I cant remember
[b]Unfinished[/b] Less glitch change in the quest Tele tabs Splash screen Promoted player (Trusted players)
[b]Activity shop[/b] The activity shop is a way to let players earn points while playing. Every 5min someone is online he or she will earn one activity point witch is spend able in the activitiy shop. Godsword prices are low, Some rares are higher in price.
Every time you earn one activity point you get a message. This message will also display how much you totaly have, You can turn this message on and off.
[b]Gilded minigame[/b] A own maded Minigame. Your target is to kill some monsters. By every kill you get NpcPoints witch you can spent on a box if you have 100. The box will give you a random item of gilded. Also some monsters give 5-8 points, Others 1. In orded to attack the monsters that give more points you need to have some npcpoints.
[b]Ice queen[/b] A cool minigame where you have to defeat the Ice queen. The Ice queen drops alot of rares but you also have a change that the Ice queen drops a key witch you can use on a chest. The chest will give you random PK points witch you can use in the pkshop!
[b]______________________________________________________________________________[/b] [b]Media[/b]
Combat [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2ur6lb6.gif[/img][IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2j5b9ea.gif[/img][IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/90slna.gif[/img][IMG]http://i54.
tinypic.com/mbpwjr.gif[/img]
Saradomin sword working with special! [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/10mloqu.jpg[/img]
Veng 100% [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/14o4mzt.gif[/img]
Switching. [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/15qxk0p.gif[/img]
Items kept on death + Stats screen! [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/5buog.jpg[/img]
Dragon bolt with effect! [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2czedh.jpg[/img]
Pk shop and a normal store (0 means infinity) [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/j6k9ww.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/33lecg8.jpg[/img]
Picture of the activity shop. [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2v9qf54.jpg[/img]
Setting tab [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/34qo03t.jpg[/img]
Quest tab commands beside ::items [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/dnlngl.jpg[/img]
[b]Credits[/b] Demise (Also for picture) YouriDudock (me)
[size=12pt][b]For all haters : Yes, This is Delta. You can call it shit but this server still gets a good amount of players and is still populair.[/b][/size]
Hope you enjoy! The IP of the client is [b]127.0.0.1[/b]. You can change this in client.java and gui.java
[size=18pt]YouriDudock[/size]
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,516722.0.html]EDGE4PK V2 IS OUT NOW![/url] [/center]

item.title: [Delta] Edge4Pk | Pk shop | Working specials | Activity shop | Pk only
item.dc:creator: @Andys_Awesome Andys Awesome
item.description:
@Andys_Awesome wrote:

[quote=“Cmoodo, post:73, topic:408285”]I can’t manage to get the compiler to work, can anyone help
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_06\bin is where jdk is[/quote]

What version of jdk do you have ?

For example I have Jdk 7u6 this means jdk1.7.0_06
lets say you have Jdk 7u3 this means you need to replace jdk1.7.0_06 with jdk1.7.0_03

Feel free to ask if you need any more help

Read full topic
